1.0.name: wordpress/hide-real-download-path
1.0.description:
This plugin allow you to hide Real path of files hosted on your server for download and help to keep your files/website more secure.

You can also allow or restrict hotlink to your files from other website.

It support multiple files extensions including: zip / pdf / doc / xls / ppt / exe / gif / png / jpg / jpeg / mp3 / wav / mpeg / mpg / mpe / mov / avi

Also create a log of all downloads on server.
